text: Sándor Mazány (16 March 1923 - 20 October 2012) was a Hungarian alpine skier. He competed in the men's downhill at the 1948 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Hungarian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Hungary Category:Alpine skiers at the 1948 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: Sándor Mazány
